snippet: The Dance Cartel’s performances embrace an inclusive philosophy that encourages audience participation, and its ragtag artistic sensibility and low ticket prices foster accessibility.
abstract: Dance Cartel, New York City-based performance group, embraces inclusive philosophy and demands high level of audience participation, joining wave of boundary-stretching live experiences around the city; group's ragtag artistic sensibility and low ticket prices foster accessibility.
lead_paragraph: The Dance Cartel’s performances embrace an inclusive philosophy that encourages audience participation, and its ragtag artistic sensibility and low ticket prices foster accessibility.

headline.main: Don’t Stand There. The Dance Cartel Wants You to Shake It!
